body: So they basically found an excuse, which wasn't even real, to turn him into a girl and then preceded to rape him until he broke and fully accepted that he was a girl, that's fucked up man, also side note: l know it's for the purpose of the Dj being GB, but why would a "rebirth" machine have to turn you into a female, instead of just wiping your memories and making you look for a job? What dumb logic author
I per sonally like the their stories, are they all quite similar yes. but that can be said for practially any porn video it doesn't mean you can't enjoy it
So....just because there is a ton of manga I'm not allowed to criticize one?  Fuck off.  If I don't like it, I can say I don't like it.
There are literally millions of manga for every taste but you find one to bitch about :)
Art is good, but wtf is this story
Correction,  it was actually a maid outfit
Wtffffffffffffff i like that nun outfit tho,  but still wtffffffffffffff
His artwork is decent I just really hate how he lays out the plot.....every last one of his stories is gender bender mind break borderline rape.
